document_data.name: Strakes
document_data.mainbody: '''Strakes''' was a domestic servant in the house of Duke [[Alaric Hembreon]] in the city of [[Zazesspur]].
document_data.Description:
Strakes combed his thin black hair over the balding spot of his head. He had long features and a button nose.

Strakes wore a uniform in the duke's official colors, white and blue.
document_data.Personality: Strakes commonly bore a sad look on his face. He had a way of speaking in which his lips  barely moved.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, when [[adventuress]] [[Zaranda Star]] had an audience with Duke Hembreon to discuss her confiscated goods, they were interrupted by Strakes, who announced that the duke's daughter, [[Tatrina Hembreon|Tatrina]] had been stealing money from her father's purse to donate to the cause of the [[All Friends]], who followed [[Ao]].
